original_text: And it came to pass, as they were burying a man, that, behold, they spied a band of men; and they cast the man into the sepulchre of Elisha: and when the man was let down, and touched the bones of Elisha, he revived, and stood up on his feet.
korean_text: 마침 사람을 장사하는 자들이 그 도적 떼를 보고 그의 시체를 엘리사의 묘실에 들이던지매 시체가 엘리사의 뼈에 닿자 곧 회생하여 일어섰더라

sentences.original_text: as they were burying a man
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 어떤 사람을 장사하고 있을 때

sentences.original_text: they spied a band of men
and they cast the man into the sepulchre of Elisha
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그 사람을 엘리사의 무덤에 던져 넣었고

sentences.original_text: and when the man was let down
and touched the bones of Elisha
and stood up on his feet
